## Project Overview

**Math-Viz** is a computational framework for the solution and visualization of classical Partial Differential Equations.

This project implements both analytical solutions (via Separation of Variables and Fourier Analysis) and numerical schemes to model the behavior of Heat, Wave, and Potential fields. It specifically focuses on the effects of varying Boundary Value Problems (Dirichlet vs. Neumann) across different coordinate systems.
